item.title: Configuring a Chocolatey Install
item.description: So yesterday I posted Pushing a new project to Chocolatey and I said I would create another post showing how to configure how the Chocolatey install runs and this is that post .
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Pushing a new project to Chocolatey
item.description: Today my DotNet Pretty articles were featured on @coding4fun by Greg Duncan and one of the comments by Niner bc3tech (@bc3tech) requested that I share this solution on Chocolatey. I decided that this was a good idea and decided to share my experience .
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
